name: STURN (Stick & Turn)
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam's "ROLL" theme. I made everything -- the art music and sound effects.

WASD = Move

J & K = Rotate
L = Dash
M = Music ON/OFF

You are Rolleo.
You spin in circles.
Objects stick to you like glue.

Collect all items and find the exit.
Do not touch any walls.
